items.sentence: Tom didn't stay in Boston for as long as he wanted.
I think that Tom can understand French fairly well.
I thought that you were supposed to be helping Tom.
I thought that you weren't supposed to talk to Tom.
I thought that you'd want to go to Boston with Tom.
I thought that the guy you were talking to was Tom.
Tom thought he should go to Boston to be with Mary.
Tom said that Mary didn't know how to speak French.
Tom said that everyone in his office speaks French.
The last time I went to Australia, I went with Tom.
I'll always remember the first time that I saw Tom.
I'm sorry that you didn't get a chance to meet Tom.
I'm glad you were able to go to Australia with Tom.
Tom thinks Mary doesn't know John can speak French.
Tom says he'll study French with Mary this evening.
Tom said he thought it might happen in Boston, too.
Doesn't anyone have anything nice to say about Tom?
I think you do need to hire someone other than Tom.
Tom told everybody that Mary couldn't speak French.
Tom may be staying with his grandparents in Boston.
